articles.content: Yesterday was meant to be Super Saturday for the cinema industry too. Amid a flurry of openings pubs, restaurants, hairdressers movie theatres were also meant to be throwing open their doors to eager… [+6514 chars]

articles.author: Russell Hope, news reporter
articles.title: Earl Cameron: Tributes paid to 'groundbreaking' black actor who appeared in Bond and Doctor Who - Sky News
articles.description: The Bermuda-born Briton appeared in Thunderball and Inception, while his TV credits included Dixon Of Dock Green and The Prisoner.

articles.author: Neela Debnath
articles.title: The Baby-Sitters Club cast: Who is Shay Rudolph? Meet the young star - Express
articles.description: THE BABY-SITTERS CLUB has landed on Netflix and promises a heart-warming watch for the whole family. Many viewers of the new series are curious about Shay Rudolph, who plays Stacey McGill in the show.
articles.content: Additionally, in the show, Stacey suffers from Type 1 Diabetes and Rudolph wanted to ensure her depiction of the condition was accurate, so she spoke to other teens who had the juvenile version of th… [+774 chars]
